Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApplySaleController
    This class allows the marketing worker to apply a new sale in their area, according to the marketing manage initiation.
    ApproveYourDeliveryController
    This class allows the user to approve an order that was delivered to them.
    AreaManagerController
    This class is the "home page" of the user "area manager" (employee).
    CEOController
    This class is the "home page" of the user "CEO" (employee).
    ChooseFacilityController
    This class functions as a simulation to determine from which facility the user will make their order (on site).
    ClientConnectFormController
    This class is in charge of connecting the client side to the system.
    ClientsReportController
    This class handles the Clients Reports - gets the relevant data from the relevant table in the data base and displays it for the user.
    ClientsToApproveController
    This class allows the area manager to approve a client account for a client.
    CollectYourOrderController
    This class allows the user to collect an order they made earlier through the E-Krut application.
    CreateNewAccountController
    This class allows the service representative to create a client account for a client.
    DeliveriesManagementController
    This class allows the deliveries operator to approve a delivery and send to the client an email and a SMS with the estimated delivery time (simulation).
    DeliveriesOperatorController
    This class is the "home page" of the user "Deliveries Operator" (employee).
    DeliveriesReportController
    This class handles the Deliveries Reports - gets the relevant data from the relevant table in the data base and displays it for the user.
    DeliveriesStatusController
    This class allows the deliveries operator to change the status of a certain delivery to "Done".
    DistantClientController
    This class is the "home page" of the user "Distant Client" (client).
    FiveMinutesTimer  
    ForDeliveryController
    This class represents the window that the user will see in their E-Krut app if they chose to make an order that they want to be delivered for them.
    InitSaleController
    This class allows the marketing manager to initiate a new sale in their area on a certain product.
    InventoryManagementController
    This class allows the operations worker to update the quantity of a certain product in its facility's inventory.
    InventoryReportController
    This class handles the Inventory Reports - gets the relevant data from the relevant table in the data base and displays it for the user.
    MarketingManagerController
    This class is the "home page" of the user "Marketing Manager" (employee).
    MarketingWorkerController
    This class is the "home page" of the user "Marketing Manager" (employee).
    MenuController
    This class represents the "Menu" window.
    OL_EKController
    This class functions as a simulation to determine whether the system will be in a OL mode or EK mode.
    OnSiteClientController
    This class is the "home page" of the user "On Site Client" (client).
    OperationWorkerController
    This class is the "home page" of the user "Operations Worker" (employee).
    OrdersReportController
    This class handles the Orders Reports - gets the relevant data from the relevant table in the data base and displays it for the user.
    PaymentController
    This class allows the user to make payment for their order.
    PickUpLaterController
    This class represents the window that the user will see in their E-Krut app if they chose to make an order that they intent to pick up at a later time or date.
    SendExecutiveOrderController
    This class allows the area manager to send an executive order to the operations worker in case a certain product in one of the facilities in the area manager's area reached below the threshold level and needs to be re-stocked.
    ServiceRepresentativeController
    This class is the "home page" of the user "service representative" (employee).
    ShowReportsController
    This class allows the user to choose the report they want to view.
    ThresholdLevelController
    This class allows the area managers to set a threshold level to the products in the facilities in their area.
    UpdateClientsDetailsController
    This class allows the service representative to update the details of a certain client.
    UpdateClientsStatusController
    This class allows the service representative to update the status of a certain client from regular client to subscriber.
    WelcomeToEKrutLoginController
    This class allows all types of users to log in to the system.
